resources.string: To hide the statusbar, this service must be running.
This will automatically start Hide Bar during boot.
Use the icon in the status bar to hide the statusbar, swipe in from bottom of the screen to make statusbar visible again.

Description: Hide Bar can be used to toggle the honeycomb status bar on and off.

 Programming: Pieter Pareit (pieter.pareit@gmail.com)

 Artwork: Birgit Niemegeers
